meanings.definition: Prepare and issue (a book, journal, etc.) for public sale.
meanings.sent1: The author publishes a new book every year.
meanings.sent2: The publishing company publishes magazines for readers.
meanings.sent3: The librarian publishes a book of jokes for the library.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter publishes joy to everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The printer publishes words that come to life on the page.

meanings.definition: Make information available to the public.
meanings.sent1: The news website publishes updates on the ongoing situation.
meanings.sent2: The government publishes reports on the economy for citizens.
meanings.sent3: The teacher publishes the answer key for the students to see.
meanings.sent4: The loudspeaker publishes announcements throughout the building.
meanings.sent5: The radio station publishes music that fills the airwaves.

meanings.definition: To print and distribute to the public.
meanings.sent1: The company publishes flyers to promote their new product.
meanings.sent2: The local newspaper publishes articles about community events.
meanings.sent3: The bakery publishes coupons for free pastries.
meanings.sent4: The wind publishes leaflets across the park.
meanings.sent5: The artist publishes posters that brighten the streets.
